tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection.Connection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothConnection, ConnectionManager, SerialConnection, WiFiConnection

    public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a generic connection. Is the super class for all connection classes
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(android.content.Context context)
      Initialises necessary variables but doesn't create a connection.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Adds a listener, which will be notified of any changes to the connection.
      abstract void connect()
      Connects to the device that was chosen last
      (package private) void connected()
      Notifies all listeners that the device has been connected to
      abstract void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the remote device.

      Notifies all listeners that the device has become disconnected for any reason.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        Connection(@NonNull
           android.content.Context context)
        Initialises necessary variables but doesn't create a connection.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the class which manages the connection

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public abstract void connect()
        Connects to the device that was chosen last

      • disconnect

        public abstract void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the remote device. Can reconnect by calling the connect method

      • sendMessage

        public abstract void sendMessage(@NonNull
                                 java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the connected device
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send as text

      • addListener

        public void addListener(@NonNull
                        ConnectionListener listener)
        Adds a listener, which will be notified of any changes to the connection. Notifies it of the current connection state
        Parameters:
        listener - - a ConnectionListener which will be notified

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(@NonNull
                           ConnectionListener listener)
        Removes a listener, which will no longer be notified of changes to the connection
        Parameters:
        listener - - a ConnectionListener which will be removed

      • disconnected

        void disconnected(@Nullable
                  java.lang.String reason)
        Notifies all listeners that the device has become disconnected for any reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason the device has been disconnected(null if deliberately closed)

      • connected

        void connected()
        Notifies all listeners that the device has been connected to

      • onNewData

        void onNewData(@NonNull
               java.lang.String newData)
        Processes the new data and notifies any listeners of the new messages
        Parameters:
        newData - the new data that hasn't been processed yet
